## Performance Issue Description
Describe the performance problem you're experiencing with Studio.

## Performance Metrics
- [ ] Slow page load times
- [ ] High memory usage
- [ ] CPU intensive operations
- [ ] Network latency issues
- [ ] Build performance
- [ ] Development server performance

- [ ] apps/web (React/Next.js application)
- [ ] packages/ui (UI component library)
- [ ] packages/api-sdk (API integration)
- [ ] Development tools
- [ ] Build process

**Technical Details:**
- Node.js version:
- Browser and version:

- Network connection:

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Perform action '....'
3. Observe performance issue

## Expected Performance
What performance level do you expect? Include specific metrics if possible.

## Actual Performance
What performance are you actually seeing? Include specific metrics if possible.

## Performance Impact
**Severity:**
- [ ] Critical - Makes Studio unusable
- [ ] High - Significantly impacts productivity
- [ ] Medium - Noticeable slowdown
- [ ] Low - Minor performance issue

**When does it occur:**
- [ ] During initial load
- [ ] During specific operations
- [ ] With large datasets
- [ ] During development
- [ ] During build process

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the performance issue:

- Browser console errors/warnings
- Network requests timing
- Memory usage patterns
- Any recent changes that might have caused this

## Development Impact
- [ ] Slows down development workflow
- [ ] Affects build times
- [ ] Impacts code generation
- [ ] Reduces developer productivity
